original_text: Jesus answered, “Very truly I tell you, you are looking for me, not because you saw the signs I performed but because you ate the loaves and had your fill.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 너희가 나를 찾는 것은 표적을 본 까닭이 아니요 떡을 먹고 배부른 까닭이로다

sentences.original_text: not because you saw the signs I performed
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 행한 표적을 보았기 때문이 아니요

sentences.original_text: but because you ate the loaves
